pageProduct.name: Avene Antirougeurs Unify Unifying Care Cream SPF 30 40ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avène Antirougeurs Unify SPF30 is a 3 in 1 product providing hydration, soothing redness relief and light coverage to unify the complexion of skin prone to redness and rosacea. The non-greasy fluid texture glides onto the skin, in a natural shade to match most skin complexions, leaving a matte finish. The complexion is immediately unified, and the presence of light-reflecting pearlescent agents and pigments help conceal redness and exude radiance. Antirougeurs Unify also provides SPF 30 broad spectrum protection, a high-level defence against UVA and UVB rays that can cause redness. An all-in-one solution that combines long-lasting efficacy, SPF protection and a uniform complexion. CLINICALLY PROVEN • 24-hour hydration1 • I mmediate and long-lasting unified complexion* • Reduced intensity of redness** PROVEN EFFICACY*** • Visibly reduces redness: 89% immediately after application, and 92% after 3 weeks • Calms skin discomfort: 92% immediately after application, and 92% after 3 weeks • Skin is soothed: 92% immediately after application, and 94% after 3 weeks 1 Measurement of the Hydration Index on 20 subjects with dehydrated skin, after 1 application on the forearm *Clinical scoring on 20 subjects – immediate assessment and 6 hours after cream application **Clinical scoring by dermatologist conducted on 32 subjects presenting a skin prone to couperosis (mild to moderate), after 28-days application period ***% of satisfaction – user test on 84 women, cream applied in the morning

Common Uses

3 in 1 product providing soothing redness relief, hydration and light coverage to unify the complexion of skin prone to redness and rosacea. Antirougeurs Unify also provides SPF 30 broad spectrum protection, a high-level defence against UVA and UVB rays that can cause redness. An all-in-one solution that combines long-lasting efficacy, SPF protection and a uniform complexion.

Ingredients

AVÈNE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). C12-15 ALKYL BENZOATE. COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE. DIMETHICONE. GLYCERIN. DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE. POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE.METHYLENE BIS-BENZOTRIAZOLYL TETRAMETHYLBUTYLPHENOL (NANO). PEG-30 DIPOLYHYDROXYSTEARATE. WATER (AQUA). COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL (COCOS NUCIFERA OIL). DIETHYLHEXYL BUTAMIDO TRIAZONE. METHYL GLUCETH-20. TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891). BIS-ETHYLHEXYLOXPHENOL METHOXPHENYL TRIAZINE. BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE. PEG-45/DODECYL GLYCOL COPOLYMER. MICA. DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE. C30-45 ALKYL METHICONE. C30-45 OLEFIN. 1,2-HEXANEDIOL 4-T-BUTYLCYCLOHEXANOL. CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. DECYL GLUCOSIDE. DIMETHICONE CROSS-POLYMER. DISODIUM EDTA. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). HELIANTHUS ANNUSS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL (HELIANTHUS ANNUSS SEED OIL). HYDROGENATED STARCH HYDROLYSATE. IRON OXIDES (CI 77492) (CI 77491) (CI 77499). MAGNESIUM SULFATE. OCTYLDODECANOL PONGAMIA GLABRA SEED OIL. PROPYLENE GLYCOL. SODIUM DEXTRAN SULFATE. TOCOPHEROL. TOCOPHERYL GLUCOSIDE. TRIETHYL CITRATE. XANTHAN GUM.

Directions

Apply in the morning, after cleansing with the Antirougeurs CLEAN Soothing Cleansing Lotion, to the face and neck.
